WorkItem.Description: Newer UEFI based devices cannot boot using the ones created by USB / DVD tool as they only allow boot using Fat32 based discs. Can you please modify the code to provide a selectable option so users can toggle between NTFS / Fat32.

Comments.Message: This should be addressed ASAP or at least have a big warning in it. There are NUMOROUS blog posts stating people can't boot from USB on their Surface Pros - most of them ended up having Surface Support exchanging their devices because even Surface support thinks this is a hardware problem. I even went through this and they opened a return ticket for me. It was just as I was getting ready to do this, I discovered UEFI devices can't boot from NTFS.
